Reviews.Title: Problems in one month
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R.
Reviews.Content: The phone came on  time, It worked very well for one month. Then I opened it yesterday and it had "Emergency Contact". I called Net10 thinking it was the Sim card. But it was not. I called Samsung but since this was an international cellphone, they could not help me. Now the phone will not even charge.

Reviews.Title: where's the wi fi calling?
Reviews.Author: wentom
Reviews.Content: phone came in fast, working the phone I noticed 3 of my friends with S3s have wi fi calling and I don't. What's up with that? Other than that everything seems good.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: shirjilahmad
Reviews.Content: its very good. better than my old blackberry torch. the thing iss the battery is sucky. best phione i ever had!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: André Federici Gomes
Reviews.Content: The unit has so far proved to be everything they say it. Perfect! The only problem I had was with the chip. The phone refused my original chip by being cut. I went to the operator, bought a microchip, and everything was resolved. I recommend the unit and the seller
